title: 高版本如何通过UUID生成头颅
author: ruce_back
txt_content:
http://mc.ahgame.com/pic/toulu/
这个是头颅网站  1.15新版本的命令改过了之后就无法使用了  
我通过/give @p minecraft:player_head{SkullOwner:"1"} 1
这种指令必须得通过正版的ID才能查询到吗
还是说可以通过/give @p minecraft:player_head{ID:"1234567"} 1来获取头颅？
说理论的话我可能看不懂   希望有例子来讲解 
拜托了
或者说把这行1.12的指令转换成高版本能用的指令
/give @p skull 1 3 {display:{Name:"Beach Sundae"},SkullOwner:{Id:"234a612e-b8cc-4d61-a783-4d058784094d",Properties:{textures:[{Value:"eyJ0ZXh0dXJlcyI6eyJTS0lOIjp7InVybCI6Imh0dHA6Ly90ZXh0dXJlcy5taW5lY3JhZnQubmV0L3RleHR1cmUvOWE3OTQ5ZDgzMmQ2YWE5YWNkM2I4YTQ0MmU3NWJiZGUzZGJjNmIxMzUwYWQyMWZhODQ3YzQ1ZTViMjQ1YTgifX19"}]}}}

SkullOwner:{Id:"234a612e-b8cc-4d61-a783-4d058784094d"里面的这个Id:" "里面是名字还是UUID？？？？？

replies.author: ruce_back
replies.txt_content:
もぺもぺ 发表于 2020-5-23 10:27
/give @p minecraft:player_head{display:{Name:"{\"text\":\"Beach Sundae\"}"},SkullOwner:{Id:"234a612e ...
厉害 ！ 秒答 ！  抢答板块（大雾）

replies.author: ruce_back
replies.txt_content:
もぺもぺ 发表于 2020-5-23 10:27
/give @p minecraft:player_head{display:{Name:"{\"text\":\"Beach Sundae\"}"},SkullOwner:{Id:"234a612e ...
后面这一段Properties:{textures:[{Value:"eyJ0ZXh0dXJlcyI6eyJTS0lOIjp7InVybCI6Imh0dHA6Ly90ZXh0dXJlcy5taW5lY3JhZnQubmV0L3RleHR1cmUvOWE3OTQ5ZDgzMmQ2YWE5YWNkM2I4YTQ0MmU3NWJiZGUzZGJjNmIxMzUwYWQyMWZhODQ3YzQ1ZTViMjQ1YTgifX19"}]}是什么意思，好像加了和不加没有区别啊

replies.author: もぺもぺ
replies.txt_content:
bruce_back 发表于 2020-5-23 10:38
后面这一段Properties:{textures:[{Value:"eyJ0ZXh0dXJlcyI6eyJTS0lOIjp7InVybCI6Imh0dHA6Ly90ZXh0dXJlcy ...
https://wiki.biligame.com/mc/Pla ... 4.E5.A4.B4.E9.A2.85

Id:"234a612e-b8cc-4d61-a783-4d058784094d" 也是可选，建议用 Properties:{textures

replies.author: A55778866579
replies.txt_content:
想偷懒可以去namemc上面找玩家并获取玩家头颅，有1.13+和1.12-的指令
前提是有档案的玩家
https://zh-cn.namemc.com/minecraft-skins

replies.author: ruce_back
replies.txt_content:
